sentences.sentence: A girl committed suicide after continued cyber-bullying and harassments.
sentences.translation: 一个女孩在持续遭到网络欺凌和骚扰后自杀。

sentences.sentence: He cited the cases of a girl committing suicide after continued cyber-bullying and harassments and an online suicide pact among youth thwarted by South Korean police.
sentences.translation: 他引用的案例是，一个女孩在持续遭到网络恐吓和骚扰后自杀和韩国警察阻止了一场年轻人间的在线自杀协定。
